summary: Overly simplistic function with unclear naming but trivial logic.
recommendations: Improve function name (e.g., 'getStaticValue' instead of 'test1') for clarity
Add JSDoc comments to explain the purpose of the function
Consider expanding into a configurable function if the return value might change in future use cases

summary: Extremely short non-descriptive variable name reduces clarity; minimal logic but side-effect dependency harms testability.
recommendations: Use meaningful function/variable names (e.g., 'logA' instead of 'a')
Add JSDoc/comment to clarify intent if retained
Wrap console.log in a testable pattern (e.g., inject logger dependency)
